{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = DrayTek Vigor 2830n plus.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Dual WAN ADSL2+ Security Firewall |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.draytek.com/user/PdInfoDetail.php?Id=131 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = DrayTek_Vigor_2830n |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = DrayTek |model = Vigor 2830 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = n |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router,dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RRK-WMPND02A1 |icid = 4833A-WMPND02A1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Infineon (Lantiq);PSB 50712;DANUBE-S; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kec |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 333 <!-- 333 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6405DMI-12G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS32M16CS-5T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8316; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = DrayTek |defaultssid_regex = ^DrayTek$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/23/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01MV99GO0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B005D9R3V2 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Alpha Networks WMP-N08 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2880; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per the manual, the default SSID is '''DrayTek'''.
The wireless module for this device may be the [[Alpha Networks WMP-N08]].
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31490-draytek-vigor-2830n-plus-dual-wan-adsl2-security-firewall-reviewed ''Draytek Vigor 2830n plus Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :SoC: [[Infineon (Lantiq)]] XWAY DANUBE-S :[[Lantiq]] PSB 50712 @333MHz ([[MIPS 24Kc]]) *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31132-draytek-vigor-2130n-reviewed ''Draytek Vigor 2130n Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[DrayTek Vigor 2130n]] - High Speed Gigabit Router â€¢ [http://www.draytek.com/user/PdInfoDetail.php?Id=111 PPage] :CPU: [[Vitesse]] (ARM926EJ-S), Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB :[[Vitesse]] VSC8601 - Gigabit Ethernet PHY (WAN) :[[MSI MP11BGN (MS-6893)]] Mini PCI Card :[[Ralink]] RT2880F/RT2820 2T3R (2.4GHz)
